title: Kutty Story Tamil Lyrics Master
stanzas:
Let me sing a kutty story 
Pay attention, Listen to me
Yenna anna English u
Just Listen Bro..

Let me sing a kutty story
Pay attention, Listen to me
If you want take it or else
Venaam tension leave it baby

Life is very short nanba
Always be happy
Palavidha problems
will come and go
Konjam chill pannu maappi

Together Man..
(Let me sing a kutty story..)
No tension baby..

Speed aa pona gavanam must -u
Slow aa pona steady um must - u
Anger always misery baby
Friends aa ninna powerful maappi

Haters are gonna hate but
Ignore calmly
Negativity ellam
thalli vai baby

Focus on what you dream and
Don’t worry maappi
Positivity unna
lift pannum baby..

Life is very short nanba
Always be happy
Very many problems
will come and go
Konjam chill pannu maappi

Students…..
(Let me sing a kutty story..)

Life is very short nanba
Always be happy
Design designa
problems will come and go
Konjam chill pannu maappi
No tension baby..

Hardwork um venum
Smart work um venum
Self motivation adhu needhane

Education venum
Dedication venum
Self valuation adha panni parren

Don’t be the person
spreading hatred maappi..
Pinnadi pesuradhu romba crappy..
Always be polite and
just don’t be nasty
You be the reason
to make someone happy

Life is very short nanba
Always be happy
Palavidha problems will come and go
Konjam chill pannu maappi

One last time…
(Let me sing a kutty story..)

Life is very short nanba
Always be happy
Design designa
problems will come and go
Konjam chill pannu maappi

That was my kutty story…
How was my kutty story..
Just awesome na..
No tension baby…
